presale.head: Auto-Buy Script:
presale.note: The Auto-Buy script is designed to allow users to send funds to the smart contract prior to the start of the TokenSale. This automates the buying process for users right at the start of the Tokensale to ensure they receive the best price and are included in the TokenSale. We designed this auto-buy script to reduce the load on the Ethereum network and our platform. This ensures that anyone who sent funds to the contract prior to the start will automatically participate in the TokenSale and is guaranteed to receive MyB Tokens.
presale.attention: The minimum amount to utilize the auto-buy functionality i is 1 ETHER. If you send less than this amount your funds will be returned to you. For amounts under 1 ETHER please wait until the official TokenSale begins on July 17th to ensure your funds are not lost. Auto-buy script will be made available here on June 28th.

disable.title: You have Two-Factor Authentication enabled
disable.warning: Disabling 2FA will make your account less secure.

enable.description: 为了增加账户的安全性，请开启双重验证
enable.qrcode: 为了使用2FA，扫描安装在手机中的谷歌认证APP上的 QR代码，或者输入显示在QR代码下面的16位秘钥
enable.key: Input the six-digit code provided by the Google Authenticator app and your account password elow, then click “Enable 2FA”.
enable.attention: 在激活 2FA之前，写下16位秘钥并保存在安全的地方。假如手机丢失了，或者被盗，系统还原，你需要这个密码恢复账号。
enable.check: 我已经备份我的16位秘钥

modal.order: in order to make a payment.
